body_html:
I am running boston.py from this tutorial
https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/input_fn, I have a Nvidia GPU 1080, tensorflow 1.3 on ubuntu 16.04
getting CUDA out of memory even for such a small dataset.
I could run a test for 10000 x 10000 matrix multiplication
